name: RoomB
description:
In an insurance selling company, play as RoomB, an empathic autonomous vacuum cleaner willing to help the coworkers in their daily life.

Scan, boost, bump, grab and make your way in a surprising office to fulfill quests and ensure everybody will attempt to the afternoon meeting!

There is quite a lot of notes and secret to find and way to occupy your time.

Available on windows.
(Playable using a keyboard, but controller highly recommanded)

Credits

- Léo Grard
- Ludovic Giovannetti
- Alric Pred'homme
- Théo Nguyen
- Gabriel Mugnaini
